dialog.teller: the top half of the picture has a large mountain.
It takes up all of the left top, but on the right side it slopes down so that there is sky to be seen
dialog.drawer: Okay is there anything else on the right side of the image

dialog.teller: not now. now on the bottom half of picture draw water from full left to right
dialog.drawer: Okay how far up from the bottom of the photo does the water go
Okay I have the water, is there any clouds in the sky?

dialog.teller: no. stretch your mountain more so it slopes almost to all the way to the right edge
dialog.drawer: Okay is that slope good enough?

dialog.teller: yeah. now on the right have one small mountain peeking up behind the big one
dialog.drawer: Okay is the the right size?

dialog.teller: yeah, now all the blue sky should be white
dialog.drawer: What is white? Do you mean snow?

dialog.teller: the sky is white. Like one big cloud I guess. no blue
dialog.drawer: Okay how is that looking for you.

dialog.teller: good. I don't know how perfect this is supposed to look? the large mountain should have lots of green trees
dialog.drawer: Okay is that enough trees for the large mountain

dialog.teller: yeah, there are large rocks in the water in the bottom half of the water
dialog.drawer: Do they need to be larger?

dialog.teller: thats fine. the only other thing I would add is putting a patch of grass on the left right under the mountain, in the water. small
dialog.drawer: how far to the right does the grass go

dialog.teller: its like a triangle of grass that goes out about one fourth of the way
dialog.drawer: How is that more or less

dialog.teller: not exactly. it's in your mountain. it should be below the mountain in the water. half size
dialog.drawer: Okay I placed it below the mountain

dialog.teller: i think we did a reasonably good job. the basics are there.
dialog.drawer: Okay you are free to submit it if you think its okay to do so. Had fun

dialog.teller: okay. hope you get to see it!
